name: OR_LNLG_SURG_ATTRE_CHG
description: This item stores if surgical attire has been changed, and it can be used for Surgical Site Infection (SSI) reporting.  Intra-op nurses will typically document this information in the Site Completion form.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SURG_ATTIRE_CHNG_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores if surgical attire has been changed.
